features: 【Practical multi-functional desk】: It is suitable for office desk, study desk, bedroom desk, computer game desk, writing desk, snack TV tray, very suitable for office, living room, rest room or bedroom or small apartment. Laptop bed frame or bookshelf / tablet shelf that can be relaxed in bed.

【Durable desk with storage】: Waterproof, no deformation, durable, 3-layer shelf can store or decorate your desk, and make full use of your living and office space! Allow you to hold books, office supplies, and store necessities anytime, anywhere.

【Ease of use】: There are 2 locking buttons on each side, which can easily and quickly change the height. The height can be freely adjusted between 28-35.4 inches. The height can be adjusted according to your own needs. You can work anywhere and weigh about 15 pounds. Space saving, easy to assemble.
【Removable and lockable】: The mobile desk with four smooth rollers allows you to move easily, and the four wheels can be fixed to prevent movement.
【After sales service】: If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. We will try our best to help you. We can refund or resend it to you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 portable desk 2 couch desk 3 small computer desk
This is the perfect complement to your home office furniture

Is the desk easy to assemble? Yes, the desk is very easy to assemble. It comes with clear instructions and all the necessary tools. I was able to put it together in less than 15 minutes. Can the desk be moved around easily? Yes, the desk is very mobile and easy to move around. It has four lockable wheels that allow you to move it around your home or office with ease. Is this desk suitable for use as a computer desk? Yes, this desk is perfect for use as a computer desk! It has a durable and waterproof surface that can withstand the wear and tear of daily use. Plus, the 3-layer shelf provides ample storage space for your computer accessories and office supplies. Can the desk be adjusted to different heights? The desk is very versatile and can be adjusted to different heights depending on your needs. It's perfect for use in your home office, living room, or bedroom. The 3-layer shelf is also great for storing your books and office supplies. Is this desk suitable for small spaces? Absolutely! I live in a small apartment and this desk fits perfectly in my bedroom. It's versatile enough to use as a study desk, office desk, or even a TV tray. And the adjustable height feature is a game-changer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to put together. Looks just like the photos. Great quality for the price. Perfect for a small space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great compact desk
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to place in my bedroom as a backup desk for remote work. I needed something that was compact yet had enough workspace to be useful. This works perfect. I was able to place it between 2 dressers and the space I was looking for. I am able to place my laptop on the top and still have plenty of workable space for taking notes and such. It was really easy to put together and came with everything I needed. No need for extra tools. The only thing I would add is that if you have a cat who likes jumping, you may want to keep it at the lowest height. The height is adjustable, which I love, however I have a fat cat who likes to jump and when he does, the desk is not sturdy enough to hold that weight. That is the only reason for the 3 stars on the sturdiness. I realize not all folks purchasing have a fat cat who will jump but if you do, just be aware:) I would purchase again. Great value for the $$.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely easy to assemble!!!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this desk for my small office at home and it is perfect. I was able to assemble by myself and it took no time at all. All my work necessities fit on it perfectly, and I can move the desk easily around my office if needed. I love that it is adjustable and has the two bottom shelves for additional storage. I am extremely happy with this purchase!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This compact desk is a fantastic little gem. It’s nice looking, has multiple shelves for storage, and is sturdy too. It was not difficult to assemble. That only took about an hour. I am using the rollers to move it from room to room easily. Great find! I recommend it.--

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mini desk for small space
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The design is unique, simple and elegant.Great for small space and unused corners at home, I placed it directly in the dining where I can enjoy eating and doing some computer work.We like the color, it’s matching our home flooring and furniture , adjustable height and very strudy with reasonable price. My wife love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I like it but one flaw
reviews.reviewText: I like this desk tbh. I have a small space and it works for what I need it for, however, every few days, I have to raise it up again because it slowly goes down as I rest my arms or something on it throughout the day. If you don’t mind that then it can work for you. But it works well as a small desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to assemble and fits in a small 5x7 room!
reviews.reviewText: The desk is small which I was looking for. It fits a small laptop and IPad. I love the shelving for books and pens. The wheels work great to move from room to room and they lock when you want to keep it stationary. Such a great buy and for a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars GOOD AND BAD
reviews.reviewText: GOOD-Easy to assemble, sturdy and nice size-Acceptable valueBAD-Wheels break when used on a rug in lieu of a smooth surface-Table tends to slide down when heavy objects are placed on it(I solved this by using a metal bolt instead of the tighteners provided

reviews.reviewTitle: Not as sturdy as it looks
reviews.reviewText: lovely idea , great for homeschooling but the table keeps shifting lower on one side

I love the product. But it has a defect. I wish they allow replacement for just 1 defective part so that I get to keep a completely good product. Since they don't, I am still ok to keep it. I used it as my printer desk at home. This serves me (& looks) better than just a mobile printer rack. I wheel it around for different users - dining hall, bedroom, study room - that need to print (using wifi) and if unused, wheel it back into the 'utility' room. Good functionality though I wonder if my Brother printer is slightly too heavy.
